name: Prairie Trail Scenic Byway
description: Experience Swedish culture and natural Kansas on this 56-mile route through McPherson and Ellsworth Counties.
fullDescription: Experience Swedish culture and natural Kansas on this 56-mile route through McPherson and Ellsworth Counties. Visit Lindsborg and Marquette and immerse yourself in Swedish culture. View the bison and elk at Maxwell Wildlife Refuge and the natural scenery at Kanopolis Lake and nearby Mushroom Rock State Park.
